titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Richard Long & Henry Vankirk, Judgments
CWG8702

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p:
Bourbon Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Ky.
agt
Richard Long
1862 April Judgment for
Plff
on Indt Betting an Election
Deft
$100.00

Att
James Paton C B C C

Bourbon Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Ky
agt
Henry Vankirk
1862 April Judgment for
Plff
on Indt Betting an Election
Deft
$100.00
Att James Paton C B C C
Richd Long & Henry Vankirk to be filed with pettn to remit fine
Att by Jesse Talbot See Downey

Upon statement of facts in this case by W. S Downey Comths Atty the fines in this case remitted
J F Robinson
Send remission to Jesse Talbott Paris
